When a natural hazard has a negative impact on humans, it is called a natural disaster. The table below shows the number of major natural disasters that occurred worldwide in 2020.

Type of natural disaster | Number of occurrences
:-: | :-:
Flood | $193$
Storm | $69$
Landslide | $19$
Earthquake | $1...

Density is an intrinsic physical property of a substance. 

Osmium is the densest element on the periodic table. A cluster of pure osmium crystals has a density of $22.6\text{ g/cm}^3.$

 [[☃ image 2]]

**What is the density of an osmium crystal that is half the size of the cluster above?**

Turkey vultures and black vultures are common scavengers found throughout North and South America. Both vulture species rely on carrion (carcasses of dead animals) for food. In turn, when both turkey vultures and black vultures find carrion, they may become aggressive and fight over the animal carca...

samples.questionContent:
A scientist captured the following micrograph of cells using a fluorescence microscope. The scientist used molecular techniques to make a certain internal cell part appear green under the microscope.

[[☃ image 1]]

The cell part shown in green is directly involved in providing structure to the cell...

options.explanation: Modified from "[SK8-18-2 human derived cells, fluorescence microscopy](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:SK8-18-2_human_derived_cells,_fluorescence_microscopy_%2829942101073%29.jpg)" by ZEISS Microscopy from Germany, [CC BY 2.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/deed.en)
